sentence.Network_en: The shapes of neuronal cell bodies are spherical, ovoid, pyramial, fusiform, stellate or crescentic.

sentence.Network_en: Crescentic glomerulonephritis is known as rapidly progressive glomerulonephritis ( RPGN ) because this disease is very progressive.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为展迅速,新月体性肾小球肾炎也称作快速进行性肾小球肾炎.
